event.name: Flight to Quality Clash
event.desc: Defeat tough enemies to earn stars and rewards! All enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attack recharges stop 11 hours before event end!

event.name: Unreal Guild Clash
event.desc: Defeat tough enemies to earn stars and rewards with your guild! All enemies start with a Fortified Tower card in play! Attack recharges stop 11 hours before event end!

event.name: Automated Guild Clash
event.desc: Defeat tough enemies to earn stars and rewards with your guild! Two additional Delay are added to the first card played in a battle. Attack recharges stop 11 hours before event end!
